content: How much do I owe in taxes?

Tax rate,Taxable income threshold
4.75%, on the portion of taxable income that is $8800 or less, plus
6.75%, on the portion of taxable income over $8800 up to $22100 plus
8.75%, on the portion of taxable income over $22100 up to $250000 plus
9.90%, on the portion of taxable income over $250000
